item.title: Do you teach CS or do you teach children?
item.description: At the time, I thought it was a bogus question. First day of a graduate class for aspiring school supervisors, the professor asks "What do you teach?" We all answered. "Math," "History," "English," etc.. At the end, the professor pointed out that "none of you said that you taught children." I thought it was bogus because we were a room full of teachers. We all taught students. What differentiated us was subject matter and grade level.
